titleStmt.title: A true and exact narrative of the proceedings of the Parliaments fleet, against the island of Barbadoes With the maner of the reducing thereof: together with the submitting of the islands of St. Christophers, Antego, and St. Mevis, to the Commonwealth of England. Written by an eye-witnesse, Mr. T.H. from aboard the Amity, in Carlisle Bay, and sent to a friend in London, to be published for satisfaction, and printed verbatim by the same copy.
titleStmt.author: T. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Harper in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
